title: 10 of the Public Health (Tobacco) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 47 of 2024) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco) (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco) (Amendment) 

Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited public health (tobacco) (amendment) act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: 10 of the Public Health (Tobacco) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 47 of 2024) shall
heading: 2. The 2nd day of February 2026 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of February 2026 is appointed as the day on which section 
10 of the Public Health (Tobacco) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 47 of 2024) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd January, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [738] 3
